address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the RTC. Defaults to `0x68`.

*See also: [DS1307 Time Source](https://esphome.io/components/time.html#ds1307-time-source)*

write_time.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) triggers a synchronization of the current system time to the RTC hardware.

*See also: [DS1307 Time Source](https://esphome.io/components/time.html#ds1307-write-time-action)*

read_time.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) triggers a synchronization of the current system time from the RTC hardware.

*See also: [DS1307 Time Source](https://esphome.io/components/time.html#ds1307-read-time-action)*
